
```{r}
flights_UA <- flights %>%
  filter(carrier == "UA")%>%
  mutate("late"= ifelse(dep_delay>0,TRUE,FALSE),"very_late"=ifelse(dep_delay>30,TRUE,FALSE))
glimpse(flights_weather_joined)
```



```{r}
flights_weather_joined <- flights %>%
  filter(carrier == "UA")%>%
  inner_join(weather, by = c("year", "month", "day", "hour", "origin"))%>%
  mutate("late"= ifelse(dep_delay>0,TRUE,FALSE),"very_late"=ifelse(dep_delay>30,TRUE,FALSE))
glimpse(flights_weather_joined)
```
